title: hacked
body: My brothers account got hacked. The hacker changed his password and we tried to recover it but it didn't work. The hacker tried to sell him rp but he said no then it logged him off saying this account is being used on another computer. He asked me if i wanted to buy rp too but he logged off my brothers account. pls help

replies.body: We can help your brother!  Just have him fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will assist with recovery and updating his info.  He'll be in good hands!

Heya Jon,

I am sorry to hear that happened to your brother! I can tell you that there's a way to fix it. The [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide can walk your brother through the process of recovering his account. Be aware that they will ask him questions to verify ownership of the account and this could take a few days. Good luck to the both of you.

- Galacius
